languages.text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Whenever a bleeding, burning, or toxin effect inflicted by the wearer deals damage to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% armour penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical hit chance against them. Stacks.

Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

languages.text: 当装备者施加的{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者攻击该名敌人时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}降低5%，而装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}暴击率提高5%。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者施加的{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}对敌人造成伤害时，装备者攻击该名敌人时，该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}降低5%，而装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}暴击率{/g}提高5%。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, наложенные персонажем, наносят {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} противнику, этот противник получает −5% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} при атаках персонажа, а персонаж получает +5% к шансу критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} по этой цели. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда кровотечение, горение или отравление, наложенные персонажем, наносят урон противнику, этот противник получает −5% к броне при атаках персонажа, а персонаж получает +5% к шансу критического попадания по этой цели. Эффект суммируется.

Когда кровотечение, горение или отравление, наложенные персонажем, наносят урон противнику, этот противник получает −5% к броне при атаках персонажа, а персонаж получает +5% к шансу критического попадания по этой цели. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 使用者が与えた{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたび、その敵は使用者の攻撃に対してのみ{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を5%受け、使用者はそれらの敵に対してクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を5%獲得する。スタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が与えた{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}が敵にダメージを与えるたび、その敵は使用者の攻撃に対してのみ{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を5％受け、使用者はそれらの敵に対してクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}を5％獲得する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: Cada vez que un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} infligido por el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo, dicho enemigo sufre una penalización de −5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} que solo se aplica a los ataques del portador, y obtiene +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico contra el mismo enemigo. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} infligido por el portador cause daño a un enemigo, dicho enemigo sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} que solo se aplica a los ataques del portador, y obtiene +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico contra el mismo enemigo. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn ein durch den Träger verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}- oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekt einem Feind {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, erleidet dieser Feind einen Abzug von −5 % auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungs{/g} (Angriffe des Trägers ausgenommen) und der Träger erhält +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen ihn. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein durch den Träger verursachter {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennungs-{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} einem Feind Schaden zufügt, erleidet dieser Feind einen -5 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstungs{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} ausschließlich auf Angriffe des Trägers und der Träger erhält +5 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} gegen ihn. Addiert sich.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} appliqué par l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi, celui-ci subit une pénalité d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de −5 % contre les attaques de l'utilisateur, et l'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique contre lui. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} appliqué par l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi, celui-ci subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de -5 % contre les attaques de l'utilisateur, et l'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique contre lui. Cumulable.

Chaque fois qu'un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} appliqué par l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi, celui-ci subit une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de -5 % contre les attaques de l'utilisateur, et l'utilisateur bénéficie de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique contre lui. Cumulable.

languages.text: Takan kişinin sebep olduğu bir {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkisi bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde o düşman, yalnızca takan kişinin saldırılarına karşı −%5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırha{/g} maruz kalır. Ayrıca takan kişi, bu düşmana karşı +%5 kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.
